# Length boundary tests
# Default: min 16, max 256

# TOO SHORT - should NOT be redacted (15 chars < 16 min)
short_key=xK9mNpL2qR5tW8v

# MINIMUM LENGTH - NOT redacted (16 chars but only 4.0 bits entropy < 4.5 threshold)
min_key=xK9mNpL2qR5tW8vY

# NORMAL LENGTH - should be redacted (32 chars, 5.0 bits entropy)
normal_key=xK9mNpL2qR5tW8vY1zA4bC7dE0fG3hJ6

# LONG but valid - should be redacted (64 chars < 256 max)
long_key=xK9mNpL2qR5tW8vY1zA4bC7dE0fG3hJ6xK9mNpL2qR5tW8vY1zA4bC7dE0fG3hJ6
